title: Pylint tool
description: Pylint is the most comprehensive static analysis tool for Python. It is extremely thorough and is the source of most messages that prospector outputs.

title: pep8 tool
description: pep8 is a tool to check your Python code against some of the style conventions in PEP 8.

title: pyflakes tool
description: A simple program which checks Python source files for errors.

title: mccabe tool
description: McCabe is a complexity checker for Python.

title: dodgy tool
description: Dodgy is a very basic tool to detect things such as accidental passwords or secret keys hard coded into files.

title: pydocstyle tool
description: pydocstyle is a static analysis tool for checking compliance with Python docstring conventions.

title: pep257 tool
description: pep257 is a static analysis tool for checking compliance with Python PEP 257.

title: frosted tool
description: Frosted is a fork of pyflakes that aims at more open contribution from the outside public, a smaller more maintainable code base, and a better Python checker for all.

title: vulture tool
description: Vulture finds unused code in Python programs.

title: mypy tool
description: Mypy is an experimental optional static type checker for Python that aims to combine the benefits of dynamic typing and static typing.

title: Bandit tool
description: Bandit is a tool designed to find common security issues in Python code.
